```{r setup, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}

library(ggplot2)

library(Lahman)

library(tidyr)
```

I just discovered how to use the `with` function and it is fantastic. It is a much better way of piping into base R functions.

```{r}
mtcars %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  with(table(gear, cyl))

mtcars %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  with(pairwise.t.test(mpg, cyl))

```
